channel.title: Network on Terminal
channel.description: Recent content in Network on Terminal

item.title: Now an entire Network
item.description:
Now im the Boss

Ok the Title is a little Rough but its True, im the Boss of the entire Network and Server from my Hackerspace

And now?

Now i do a Meeting so we can Start with our Site that we are working on

How it come so?

It comes so that i was not Happy with the last Manager and i reported them and then there was a really big Thing about it and now i am the Manager
item.content:
Now im the Boss

Ok the Title is a little Rough but its True, im the Boss of the entire Network and Server from my Hackerspace

And now?

Now i do a Meeting so we can Start with our Site that we are working on

How it come so?

It comes so that i was not Happy with the last Manager and i reported them and then there was a really big Thing about it and now i am the Manager

What do you do after the Meeting?

After the Meeting im Starting with my Tasks because im mainly for the Network here and so im do a little Cleaning with VPN etc. and then well see + im making a Failoversystem but it should go becuase the Failover start only then when it should
